intro.title: Jon Holmberg
intro.welcome: Hi, I'm a passionate Full-stack Developer based in San Francisco, CA.

about.title: About Me
about.bio_1: With six years of experience, I specialize in building user interfaces using JavaScript, React, and TypeScript to develop dynamic, responsive web applications. I collaborated with marketing and product teams, resolved project bugs, and ensured daily site testing for optimal performance.
about.bio_2: I have maintained and developed over 50 Magento sites, upgrading listing pipelines for dynamic auction creation. I built buyer/seller profile UIs using ReactJS, Redux-saga, Hooks, Router, and Formik, and improved SEO through strategic keywords and friendly URLs.
about.bio_3: As the chief technical resource for Samâ€™s Club auctions, I developed APIs for CCPA request processing and enhanced SSO security. I also created a PHP shipping API for Walmart BStock to generate shipping quotes. Additionally, I designed features that allow buyers to select shipping addresses and search auctions by location and category.

project_header.title: Portfolio
project_header.company_notes: Company auction sites I developed while at B-Stock Solutions

project1.title: Spice Delight App
project1.bio: A go-to app for exploring mouthwatering food items and recipes made to order. Whether you're a seasoned chef or a culinary enthusiast, our app will tantalize your taste buds and inspire your next cooking adventure!

footer.connected: Feel free to connect with any of my social network accounts
